description: A TrafficArea is the ground surface of a TrafficSpace. Traffic areas are the surfaces upon which traffic actually takes place.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the TrafficArea.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the TrafficArea.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the TrafficArea.

properties.name: surfaceMaterial
properties.description: Specifies the type of pavement of the TrafficArea.
